13.content:
The next morning, Josh woke up, thinking that having sex with his clone was just a weird (but fantastic) dream. But upon seeing the person lying in bed with him, he saw that it wasn't a dream after all. He really had dreamt up a clone version of himself! Now he began to think about other ways he could use these new-found powers of his.

He already had fun with himself, so to speak, so why not do something with his family?

Smiling, he headed down to breakfast. As usual, his family was sitting around the kitchen table. There was his 19-year old sister Crystal (blond hair, C-cup breasts, and thin), his 45-year old mom Jennifer (light brown hair, C-cup breasts, and slightly overweight), and his 47-year old dad John (brown-slightly-graying hair and a little overweight, mostly in his gut). All of them were conservative types and were somewhat religious (they didn't attend church every week, but they still considered themselves to be denominational).

Josh was secretly bisexual. He never wanted his family to find out, as they weren't all that supportive of gay people. But with his new-found power, maybe he could do something about that. He didn't know how he knew, but he knew that he could make anything he wanted come true.

"Morning, sweetie. You want anything?" his mom asked him, the moment he entered the kitchen.

"Actually, yeah," Josh answered, then began to fantasize in his mind what he wanted to happen.

Josh decided to turn his dad gay and turn his mom and sister into lesbians. After all, if they were homosexual, then they certainly wouldn't have a problem with Josh being bisexual, right?

But should he keep their memories the same or not? It might be kind of fun (in a mean kind of way) to see them trying to cope with being gay when they're so against it.
